data.name: Retrowave Rider
data.detailed_description:
Drive forward onto the neon-lit road.
You will conquer the path before you. Use color-switching powers to reshape the levels to your advantage.

  • Hand-crafted level design
  • An unique mix of runner and puzzle that will keep you on your toes
  • Extra collectables that unlock customization options for your rider
  • Accessibility support for colorblindness, and for people with slower reaction times

data.short_description: Retrowave Rider is a mash up of Geometry Dash and Guitar Hero. Dive into synthwave worlds filled with retro-inspired visuals and smooth synth sounds, and experience this journey with all of its trials and glories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3245 / AMD Athlon II X4 645
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 / AMD Radeon Vega 3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
